title: NBC’s ‘Timeless’ Repeats as Winner of USA TODAY’s Save Our Shows
text:
Save Our Shows (Photo: USA TODAY LIFE)

NBC’s Timeless was named the winner of USA TODAY’s 21st Annual Save Our Shows poll, topping the poll for the second consecutive year in a record voter turnout. 58% of voters indicated they want to keep Timeless for a third season, despite its struggles in the Nielsen ratings. Last year, fans also picked the time-travel drama as their favorite in USA TODAY’s poll of television shows hovering “on the bubble” between renewal and cancellation, and the series ended up being renewed after initially being cancelled, thanks to fan support.

This year’s turnout of more than 257,000 votes broke last year’s record by over 110,000. Fans had from April 4 to April 29 to cast their ballots at sos.usatoday.com for their favorite of the 30 scripted network series “on the bubble.”

Following Timeless, ABC’s Designated Survivor came in second in the poll, with 48% of voters wanting to save it, and NBC’s The Blacklist came in third, with 41%. NBC’s Champions ranked last, with only 5% of voters supporting its renewal. Voters were given “drop” or “don’t care” choices, in addition to “keep.” Notably, more voters wanted to cancel NBC’s Kevin Can Wait than any other show, while only 16% wanted to renew it.

“Timeless fans have outdone themselves again,” said Alison Maxwell, managing editor of USA TODAY’s Life section. “It’s amazing to see the passion and dedication of TV fans, and we’re proud that Save Our Shows is the outlet for fans to have their voices heard.”

The full list of results includes:

Timeless (NBC) – 58%

Designated Survivor (ABC) – 44%

The Blacklist (NBC) – 41%

Criminal Minds (CBS) – 35%

Elementary (CBS) – 33%

Brooklyn Nine-Nine (Fox) – 33%

Scorpion (CBS) – 31%

The 100 (CW) – 30%

Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. (ABC) – 29%

Fresh Off the Boat (ABC) – 27%

Blindspot (NBC) – 25%

Lucifer (Fox) – 25%

The Brave (NBC) – 23%

Quantico (ABC) – 21%

Life in Pieces (CBS) – 21%

Speechless (ABC) – 19%

Code Black (CBS) – 17%

Deception (ABC) – 17%

Taken (NBC) – 16%

Kevin Can Wait (CBS) – 16%

iZombie (CW) – 16%

Man With a Plan (CBS) – 15%

Station 19 (ABC) – 15%

For the People (ABC) – 15%

Superior Donuts (CBS) – 15%

Last Man on Earth (Fox) – 11%

AP Bio (NBC) – 9%

Living Biblically (CBS) – 7%

Great News (NBC) – 7%

Champions (NBC) – 5%

Read or Share this story: https://usat.ly/2rb8bht
description: Fans voted to save the series for the second consecutive year.
